backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing surgery cases and user profiles with access control, CRUD operations, and checklist support.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a UI enhancement request to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of humanâ€‘written summaries describing the purpose of all frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light and dark OKLCH color variables and global layout rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication flow, profile setup, and rendering the case list UI.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Lo: Authentication button toggling Internet Identity login and logout with query cache clearing.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Pr: Modal prompting new users for their name and saving profiles via backend mutation.
frontend/src/features/cases/checklist.ts: Defines checklist item metadata, default checklist values, and utility to extract remaining tasks.
frontend/src/features/cases/components/C: Displays a surgery case card with highlighted complaint/notes sections, styled checklist badges, and edit/delete actions.
Form dialog component for creating and editing surgery cases, handling field state, validation, and submission mutations.
Displays the list of surgery cases with search, CSV import/export, and a dialog for creating new cases.
Search input component for filtering cases by text query.
Editor UI for toggling checklist boolean fields on a case.
Provides CSV import/export controls for surgery cases, including file handling and mutation calls.
frontend/src/features/cases/components/D: Reusable date input component with both text and calendar picker support.
Implements CSV export and import logic for surgery cases, including parsing, validation, and matching existing cases.
frontend/src/features/cases/csv/caseCsvS: Defines CSV headers and row type for surgery case CSV structure.
frontend/src/features/cases/search.ts: Search utility that filters cases by matching text, dates, species, sex, and checked checklist items.
frontend/src/features/cases/types.ts: Defines case form data type and dropdown options for species and sex.
frontend/src/features/cases/validation.t: Validation utilities for case fields and date/format helpers including nanosecond conversions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading stored identities and exposing login, logout, and status state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query wrappers for backend calls such as user profile, cases, and checklist CRUD operations using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function for merging Tailwind class names with clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App bootstrap that wraps the root component with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, OKLCH color mappings, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines current app state, including project version, feature list, architectural notes, and known issues. Describes requirements for case fields, checklist behavior, UI details, and CSV import/export.
